sentences.en: Each week Dr Buczacki chooses a listener's question and gives a detailed answer.

sentences.en: I felt it politic to keep my peace and play the part of the attentive listener.

I've thought so often how to tell changes with the nature of the listener.

sentences.en: If you can be a sympathetic listener, it may put your own problems in perspective.
sentences.cn: 如果你能充满同情心地倾听别人的说话，也许就能够正确地认识自己的问题。

sentences.en: Music can induce a meditative state in the listener.
sentences.cn: 音乐能够引导倾听者沉思。

sentences.en: Radio should enlighten the listener as well as entertain him.
sentences.cn: 无线电广播既要使听众得到娱乐也要使他受到教育.

sentences.en: The deep guttural sounds of the speaker were scarcely intelligible to the newly - waked, bewildered listener.

sentences.en: The listener receives the communicated message may provide feedback to the speaker.
sentences.cn: 听众接受传达到的信息,并且向演说者提供反馈.

sentences.en: The tonic is carried inside the listener's head.
sentences.cn: 主音一直在听者头脑中回旋.

sentences.en: They offered to pay $ 2 a pound for the biggest biscuit baked by a listener.
sentences.cn: 他们提出以每磅两美元的价格购买听众烤出的最大饼干.

sentences.en: They raised $630,000 through listener donations, and then called it quits.
sentences.cn: 他们通过听众捐款的方式筹集了63万美元后宣告结束。
